channel.title: Silabs client.... i keep getting "connection error, retrying in 10 seconds.."
channel.description:
It just keeps going up from 10 seconmds to like 300 seconds
whats wrong? how do i fix it?

item.title: Silabs client.... i keep getting "connection error, retrying in 10 seconds.."
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

[quote=“Runer King, post:4, topic:139854”]Ok I am making this post for people who are having trouble with Miss Silabsoft’s Client I will try my best to help you here are some simple things that could work

Setting your Environmental Variables if you have not done this go here
http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=24790

Downloading Mopar Clientv3.2

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Download Miss Silabsoft’s Latest Client
http://dnd.no-ip.org/version3

If none of those work post your problem with picture’s here so I or someone else can help.

|Runer King|[/quote]

Orignally posted by me if oyu dont believe check time and date http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,192088.0.html

Read full topic
